validation.required: At least one of the options requires to be selected.
This field is required to be filled in.

noMoreInformation.name: No more information needed
noMoreInformation.description:
We have all the information that we need regarding your {item} at this time.

To continue with the survey, select the "Continue" button below and we will automatically select the next food or meal that we still need some information about.

Alternatively, select a meal or food on the left if you would like to focus on a particular item.

validation.required: One of the options requires to be selected.
This field is required to be filled in.
This field is required to be filled in.

addonFoods.name: Add-on foods
addonFoods.description: Have you had any add-on foods with following foods?

associatedFoods.name: Associated foods
associatedFoods.existingFoodHint: Choose "Yes, I had some" if you have already entered it.
associatedFoods.moreFoodsQuestion: Did you have any other foods from this category?
associatedFoods.existingFoodsTitle: Was it something you already entered?
associatedFoods.none: No food results. Try refining your search.

missing.label: I can't find my food
missing.description:
Try browsing the food categories listed above to find your food.

If you still can't find your food select 'Report a missing food'.

editMeal.name: Edit Meal
editMeal.description:
Tell us everything you had for your {meal}.

Enter each food and drink separately.

Press or the Enter/Return key to add each food and drink.

Do not enter how much you had, just the food names.

foodSearch.name: Search Food
foodSearch.description:
Below is the list of foods from our database that look like "{food}".

Choose the item you had or the closest match.
foodSearch.none: No food results. Try refining your search.
foodSearch.refine: The search has found a lot of results. You can try refining your search.
foodSearch.pizza: If your pizza was from a takeaway or restaurant, select that option in the list.

missing.label: I can't find my food
missing.description:
If you can't find your food in the list, try rephrasing your description in the search text box above.

Or select 'Browse all foods' and explore the food categories.

If you still can't find your food select 'Report a missing food'.

confirmDiscardFood.label: Yes
confirmDiscardFood.messageUnsafe:
You have already answered some questions about "{discardedFoodName}"!

If you change it to "{selectedFoodName}" now, you might have to answer some of those questions again.

Are you sure you would like to replace this food?
confirmDiscardFood.message: You have already answered some questions about "{discardedFoodName}"! If you change it to "{selectedFoodName}" now, you might have to answer some of those questions again. Are you sure you would like to replace this food?

mealAdd.name: Add Meal
mealAdd.description: Select one from the list below if it is appropriate.
mealAdd.label: Select predefined meal

custom.description: Enter the name of this meal. You can either type your own name, or select one from the list below if it is appropriate.
custom.label: Select predefined or enter meal name

mealAdd.exists: Entered meal already exists, select another meal.
mealAdd.noMeal: No meals remaining, add at least one

mealDuration.name: Meal duration
mealDuration.description: How long did it take you to eat {mealName}?

mealGap.name: Meal gap
mealGap.before: Did you have any meals, snacks or drinks before your {meal} at {mealTime}?
mealGap.after: Did you have any meals, snacks or drinks after your {meal} at {mealTime}?
mealGap.between: Did you have any meals, snacks or drinks between your {startMeal} (at {startMealTime}) and your {endMeal} (at {endMealTime})?

mealTime.name: Edit Time
mealTime.description: Did you have {meal}? If so, what time was this?

recallDate.name: Recall date
recallDate.description: Select the date for which you are filling the recall in.

readyMeal.name: Ready meal
readyMeal.description: Was this a ready-made meal or food?

sameAsBefore.name: Same as before
sameAsBefore.description: Was this {food} the same as the one you had before?
sameAsBefore.notSame: No, I had a different one

splitFood.name: Split food
splitFood.description: It looks like you entered more than one food item on the line.
splitFood.singleSuggestion: Select 'keep as single food' if you meant a single food such as chicken and vegetable soup.
splitFood.singleSuggestionEx: Select 'keep as single food' if you meant a single food such as {food}.
splitFood.separateSuggestion: Select 'separate foods' for items such as fish and chips.
splitFood.separateSuggestionEx: Select 'separate foods' for items such as {food}.

portionSizeOption.name: Portion method
portionSizeOption.description: How do you want to estimate your portion?

selections.use_these_crisps_in_a_bag: Use these crisps in a bag
selections.use_tortilla_chips_in_a_bowl: Use tortilla chips in a bowl

portionSizeOption.unknown: There is currently no portion size estimation method for {food}.

serving.header: Using these pictures, choose how much {food} you had.

leftovers.header: Did you leave some of your {food}?
leftovers.label: Using these pictures, choose how much {food} you left.

cereal.name: Cereal
cereal.container: Select the bowl that looks most like the one you used for your {food}.

directWeight.name: Weight
directWeight.description: Enter how much you had in grams or mls.

drinkScale.name: Drink scale
drinkScale.container: Select the cup or glass that looks most like the one you used for your {food}.

serving.header: Use the slider or tap on the cup or glass to indicate how much you had.

leftovers.header: Did you leave some of your {food}?
leftovers.label: Use the slider on the right to choose how much you had left.

drinkScale.count: How many of these drinks did you have at this time?

guideImage.name: Guide image
guideImage.label: Select the image that is the closest match to the size of {food} you had.
guideImage.quantity: Choose how many of {food} you had.

milkInAHotDrink.name: Milk in a hot drink
milkInAHotDrink.label: How much {food} did you have in your tea or coffee?

milkOnCereal.name: Milk on cereal
milkOnCereal.container: Select the bowl that looks most like the one you used for your {food}.
milkOnCereal.milk: Choose the level your milk came up to (without cereal).

missingFood.name: Missing food
missingFood.description: You said you were unable to find a good match for "{food}". Provide as much detail as you can to the following questions, to help us identify your food or drink.
missingFood.homemade: Provide further details e.g. description of dish or ingredients.
missingFood.purchased: Tell us where was it purchased from? Does it have a brand name?
missingFood.portionSize: How much did you eat? E.g. 1 pack, 2 teaspoons, 1 handful, 125 grams, Â½ cup etc.

recipeBuilder.name: {food} recipe builder
recipeBuilder.description: Follow the steps below to build your own recipe for {food}.
recipeBuilder.label: Add your own {searchTerm}
recipeBuilder.none: No food results. Try refining your search.
recipeBuilder.missingAllIngredients: Add at least one ingredient to continue.

missing.label: I can't find my food
missing.description:
Try browsing the food categories listed above to find your food.

If you still can't find it, click the button below to report a missing food.

parentFoodPortion.name: Parent food portion
parentFoodPortion.label: How much {food} did you have in your {parentFood}?

pizza.name: Pizza
pizza.typeLabel: Select the pizza that is closest to the size you had.
pizza.sizeLabel: What size slice(s) did you have?

whole.label: How many of these pizzas did you have?

slices.label: How many of these slices did you have?

sizes.label: What size pizza did you have?

crusts.label: What type of pizza crust did you have?

units.label: How do you want to estimate your portion?

quantity.slice: How many slices did you have?
quantity.whole: How many whole pizzas did you have?

standardPortion.name: Standard portion
standardPortion.label: How would you like to estimate the portion size of your {food}?
